other_title: アンジェリーク　～白い翼のメモワール～ (Japanese)
plot: Angelique is the queen of the cosmos in a lush fantasy world, with nine strong and handsome guardians at her command. What started as a simple reunion between friends turned into a nightmare when the recently deceased Arios came back from the dead with a sinister plan to kill both queens.
opening_theme: "Jiyuu no Shisha" by the Jet Sets
